plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fantasy, their favourite plot is character-driven, their favourite setting is a fictional world, their favourite writing style is descriptive and evocative, their favourite length is novel-length, their favourite topic is mythology and religion, their favourite pacing is slow and methodical, their favourite narrative structure is third-person omniscient, and their favourite themes are morality, spirituality, and the nature of reality.
